examples: I was afraid to tell anyone

pronoun.description: A person of importance or authority.
examples: they are read by anyone who's anyone

phrases: I can drink most anything else, but three pints and I'm anyone's.
Give me a sandwich, a large vodka and non-stop football and I'm anyone's.
A couple of lager shandies and he's anyone's.
I can try to sum it up with: a couple of drinks and she's anyone's!
